note.p: Birth: Montlucon, France (08 December 1594 or 31 December 1598)
Career: Commissaire provincial de l'artillerie (1633); visited ports in France and Italy; friend of Pascal, with whom he did experiments on vacuums; Intendant-general des fortifications (1649)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB; Biographie Universelle; Hunter
Notes: Later birth date from Hunter and DSB.
